scripts.install-env: npm run install-api-node && npm run install-routing-node && npm run install-dummy-client
scripts.compile-env: npm run compile-api-node && npm run compile-routing-node && npm run compile-dummy-client
scripts.start-routing-node-1: cd ./flake-routing-node && cross-env PORT=9985 NODE_ENV='development' node dist/index.js
scripts.start-routing-node-2: cd ./flake-routing-node && cross-env PORT=9986 NODE_ENV='development' node dist/index.js
